reviews.author: Highkey mami
reviews.review: There was a shift in management here and since then the communication has increased, the professionalism and the response in maintenance has remained in good standing. They approve people who really need it and the the units itself are pretty decent.

reviews.author: J A
reviews.review: They did not honor their $250 rent concession for September that was offered to tenants who renewed their lease. Then had the nerve to charge late fees on that $250 because they were negligent in crediting it on time. Impossible to get it

ownerResponse.text: Hi there this is Kailey with the Customer Service team. Thank you for the feedback. I am sorry to hear about your frustrations with the concession. Our team is working through files to ensure accuracy. I welcome the opportunity to speak  More

reviews.author: jade nason

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for sharing your candid experience with us. We value your feedback and have provided your comments to our team. Please contact our Customer Care Team directly at customerservice@plpinc.net if there is anything we can assist you with at this point.

reviews.author: Bri Dague
reviews.review: Here goes nothing: My roomates and I did a lease takeover with Landmark at the beginning of the year. That process was hell but at least we were able to get a decent place in Bellingham at an affordable price when split between the 3 of us.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Bri, this is Wendee from Customer Service.  I am really sorry had a bad experience.  Unfortunately when there is ownership/management we are not able to please everyone.  We are investing long term in the property to make it better and  More

bear with me, this will be long,

reviews.author: Brady Hanson
reviews.review:
The 1-star Reviews are from a bunch of entitled college freshmen.
The two most popular moans and groans:
- The rent is average for Bellingham

ownerResponse.text: Hi Brady, this is Wendee from Customer Service.  Thank you for your review and kind words.  Our team does take the good and bad reviews to heart so when there is a good one we get excited to hear it.  I will be sure to pass this along to the team.  Take care, Wendee

reviews.author: Zachary Smith
reviews.review: Well I originally gave this place a nasty review, however that was under the last management company. I can say that the new management company has turned this place around! The maintenance workers have been on top of everything and they single handedly changed my view of this place! Great place to live for the price point!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Zachary, we regret to hear that you're initial experience has been negative, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Our team has been in contact to help address these issues, and we hope you will really enjoy  More

reviews.author: Marilyn Valdez
reviews.review: As a parent I was impressed with the onsite management team doing their best to meet all of our requirements. Haley and Abby were always accessible and offered great tips and resources for a first time student living away from home.  Really appreciated the helpful onsite. MV

ownerResponse.text: Hi Marilyn, it is wonderful to hear how much you enjoy the time our team spent with you and your child. We strive to offer great service at Sky Vue Apartments. Thanks for tossing out a little online love for the team, it will make their day! Take care!

reviews.author: Julie Rounds
reviews.review: I love my apartment! The staff really cares about the property and the residents. They keep hallways and parking lot clean.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for the feedback! We're so glad you enjoy the team and community :)

reviews.author: Xavier Van Diest
reviews.review: Very generous, understanding, and kind! Difficult to get a hold of, but once done, extremely easy to talk to!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Xavier, thanks for the honest & kind feedback! We were swamped getting everything prepared for move in weekend with hundreds of new move ins. Our team is ALWAYS here for you though! Thanks again!

reviews.author: Mayu Molina
reviews.review: Working with Cholee was a pleasure! Great apartment complex!

reviews.author: Pootaro
reviews.review: Great place to stay and amazing staff much better than any of the dorms

ownerResponse.text: Hi there, this is Kailey from Customer Service. Thank you for taking the time to post your review for Sky Vue Apartments. I am so happy to hear that you are loving your apartment and our team. I agree that it's a great choice for student housing! Have a great day, Kailey

reviews.review: Super polite staff that are more than willing to help you with whatever you need!

reviews.review: This place kinda blows super close to Interstate constant construction and out dated apartments
